newsitem.title: USA: USDA to buy 1,476,000 lbs frozen hams for schools.
newsitem.headline: USDA to buy 1,476,000 lbs frozen hams for schools.

text.p: The Agricultural Marketing Service (AMS) of the U.S. Department of Agriculture said it plans to buy 1,476,000 lbs of frozen smoked fully cooked hams (type II) for use in the National School Lunch Program.

All offers must be in the format prescribed in LS-50 and be received by 1400 EDT in Washington, D.C., on Monday, September 9, 1996. Acceptances will be announced by midnight Friday, September 13, 1996.
Shipments must be made between October 13 and 26, 1996.
